text: The 2014–15 Damehåndboldligaen (known as the Boxer Dameligaen for sponsorship reasons) is the 79th season of the Damehåndboldligaen, Denmark's premier Handball league. == Team information == The following 12 clubs compete in the Damehåndboldligaen during the 2014–15 season: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Arena !
